text: In aid, the proper attitude is one omitting gratitude.
author: Marya Mannes

text: In Scotland over many years we have cultivated through our justice system what I hope can be described as a 'culture of compassion.' On the other hand, there still exists in many parts of the U.S., if not nationally, an attitude towards the concept of justice which can only be described as a 'culture of vengeance.'
author: Keith O'Brien

text: Any time I need to get a serious attitude adjustment, I put on one of their records, and there are examples there for all time to keep us honest and keep us reaching they'll never be eclipsed.
author: Benny Green

text: I always had the attitude that I wanted to throw a no-hitter every game.
author: Dennis Eckersley

text: I like actors that are good with pantomime and that can transmit a lot by their presence and attitude more than through their dialogue.
author: Guillermo del Toro
